channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Virginia Tech on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Boosting Alignment for Post-Unlearning Text-to-Image Generative Models
item.description: This research introduces a novel framework for post-unlearning in text-to-image generative models, optimizing model updates to ensure both effective forgetting and maintained text-image alignment.

item.title: DC-Gaussian: Improving 3D Gaussian Splatting for Reflective Dash Cam Videos
item.description: DC-Gaussian: A novel method generates high-fidelity novel views from dashcam videos by addressing common windshield obstructions (reflections, occlusions) using adaptive image decomposition, illumina…

item.title: Fairness-Aware Meta-Learning via Nash Bargaining
item.description: Nash bargaining resolves hypergradient conflicts in fairness-aware meta-learning, boosting model performance and fairness.

item.title: SpaFL: Communication-Efficient Federated Learning With Sparse Models And Low Computational Overhead
item.description: SpaFL: A communication-efficient federated learning framework that optimizes sparse model structures with low computational overhead by using trainable thresholds to prune model parameters.

item.title: Taming Heavy-Tailed Losses in Adversarial Bandits and the Best-of-Both-Worlds Setting
item.description: This paper proposes novel algorithms achieving near-optimal regret in adversarial and logarithmic regret in stochastic multi-armed bandit settings with heavy-tailed losses, relaxing strong assumptions…
